item.s: Every moment you fall down , try to talk with someone that is really close to you .
That one might know you more than yourself , and he/she could give you enough motivation to make you stand up again and keep moving forward .
The reason is sometimes motivational advises would push a person to the limits and inspire him/her achieve his/her goals .
And , by saying surroundings I do n’t mean that you should just talk with people .
You might get motivated by watching a movie , a picture of something that could touch you hard , or a circumstance that might change the whole of your personality in a small period of time .
“ Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it . ”
On the other hand , train yourself to motivate yourself is a conjecture that lead a person to inspire himself by visualizing positive thinking in his/her brain .
This state could vary many dis-courage people .

item.s: It is has been said many times that people have to learn from their mistakes .
